An example use of Combine.cfc

This is a simple example of using Combine.cfc to combine and minify Javascript and CSS.

Javascript

If you see a JavaScript alert when the page loads, then the JavaScript combining is working.

CSS

If the background of this page is grey, and this text is bold, then the CSS working.


Note: this example uses Combine's caching, the cache folder is located at the same level as this .htm file
